pkgmetadata.longdescription: Effect Size Computation for Meta Analysis // Implementation of the web-based 'Practical Meta-Analysis Effect Size Calculator' from David B. Wilson (http://www.campbellcollaboration.org/esca lc/html/EffectSizeCalculator-Home.php) in R. Based on the input, the effect size can be returned as standardized mean difference, Cohen's f, Hedges' g, Pearson's r or Fisher's transformation z, odds ratio or log odds, or eta squared effect size.
